attributes.action: Stop the Uk from sending weapons to isreal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Well I have heard that the UK have been sending weapons to Isreal, unfortunatly the Isrealeans have been using the weapons in an inapropreate manner. Such as killing inacent people and little children. So we want the UK to stop sending weapons to Isreal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
